footer.lb-text-footer-section:language-warning: The site translation is still under development and is currently being improved.
footer.lb-text-footer-section:language-unavaila: Some sections of this page may appear in the original language.

main.lb-text-main-section:desc-time: Orders must be placed 72 hours in advance to ensure you receive fresh, high-quality products.
main.lb-innerHTML-main-section:desc-ubication: We offer free shipping to Barracas, La Boca, and San Telmo. Feel free to contact us via WhatsApp for information about shipping to your location.
main.lb-text-main-section:desc-whatsapp: Orders are placed exclusively through WhatsApp. This page is for informational purposes only.
main.lb-text-main-section:desc-cookies: We use cookies solely to remember your configuration preferences. We do not use third-party cookies or collect any personal information. By continuing to browse, you agree to the use of these cookies.

products.lb-innerHTML-products-section:figcaption:
The image is for illustrative purposes only and may not match the current composition or presentation of the product.
Please contact us via WhatsApp for detailed information.
products.lb-text-products-section:shipping1: Free delivery to Barracas, La Boca and San Telmo.
products.lb-text-products-section:shipping2: You can pick up your order in person with prior notice.
products.lb-text-products-section:orders2: Place your order at least 72 hours in advance.

faq.lb-text-faq-section:desc-faq: We have made available some basic questions you may have about our products and services. We also offer several ways for you to contact us so we can provide you with better support.
faq.lb-innerHTML-faq-section:faq10:
Do you still have questions or concerns?
If you still have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us via Instagram or WhatsApp. This will allow us to provide better support and address all your inquiries about our products and services.
